title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: National Water Trail
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     National Water Trail              National Water Trail          On February 29, 2012 Secretary of the Interior Ken Salazar signed Secretarial Order No. 3319 that establishes a National Water Trail System as a class of national recreational trails under the National Trails System Act of 1968. after signing the Order he announced the Chattahoochee River National Water Trail (CRNWT) as the first trail to be designated as a national water trail. The water trail consist of the Chattahoochee River as it flows through the Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area.
